description: This file is a test configuration file (`conftest.py`) used with pytest for setting up test fixtures related to a FastAPI application, mocking configurations, and defining helper classes for testing.

classes.name: DummyResponse
classes.description: A helper subclass of httpx.Response to easily generate mock JSON responses for tests.

methods.name: Generator[None,None,None] _reset_runtime_config(monkeypatch)
methods.description: A fixture that resets application configuration to deterministic defaults before each test to avoid real network calls or webcam usage.

methods.name: Generator[TestClient,None,None] client()
methods.description: A fixture providing a FastAPI TestClient for API integration testing.

methods.name: "DummyResponse" json_response(cls, status_code: int, data: dict)
methods.description: A class method of DummyResponse to create a mock response with a JSON body, status code, and headers.

ctags.name: json_response
ctags.pattern: /^    def json_response(cls, status_code: int, data: dict) -> "DummyResponse":$/
